thread.title: ARCHER LAW OFFICES PC
thread.title_full: Blumberg Excelsior, Inc. reviewed by ARCHER LAW OFFICES PC

author: ARCHER LAW OFFICES PC
title: ARCHER LAW OFFICES PC
text: Despite multiple attempts I was unable to place simple order online and was notified on each attempt that Blumberg customer service would contact me. They never did. I called a few days later, placed the order and have still not received it a week later.
